title: Definitions
context: ยง486N-1 Definitions. As used in this chapter, unless the context otherwise requires: &ldquo;Business day&rdquo; means any calendar day on which the health club is open for inspection and use by the buyer, except Saturdays, Sundays, and state or federal holidays. &ldquo;Buyer&rdquo; means a natural person who enters into a health club contract. &ldquo;Contract price&rdquo; means the price for the purchase of a membership in a health club or for services offered by a health club or for use of the facilities of a health club. Contract price does not include the cost of financing or late charges or penalties. &ldquo;Department&rdquo; means the department of commerce and consumer affairs. &ldquo;Director&rdquo; means the director of commerce and consumer affairs. &ldquo;Health club&rdquo; means any person operating a business organized for profit, offering facilities or services for the maintenance or development of physical fitness or well-being through physical exercise. Each location at which the facilities or services are offered shall be deemed a separate health club. &ldquo;Health club contract&rdquo; means a contract for membership in a health club, or for services offered by a health club, or for use of facilities of a health club, for a period longer than seven days. &ldquo;Social and recreational facilities&rdquo; means those portions of the facilities of a health club devoted primarily to dining and entertaining.
